dhp256-272:256: Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho,yenatthaṁ sāhasā naye;Yo ca atthaṁ anatthañca,ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
dhp256-272:257: Asāhasena dhammena,samena nayatī pare;Dhammassa gutto medhāvī,"dhammaṭṭho"ti pavuccati.
dhp256-272:258: Na tena paṇḍito hoti,yāvatā bahu bhāsati;Khemī averī abhayo,"paṇḍito"ti pavuccati.
dhp256-272:259: Na tāvatā dhammadharo,yāvatā bahu bhāsati;Yo ca appampi sutvāna,dhammaṁ kāyena passati;Sa ve dhammadharo hoti,yo dhammaṁ nappamajjati.
dhp256-272:260: Na tena thero so hoti,yenassa palitaṁ siro;Paripakko vayo tassa,"moghajiṇṇo"ti vuccati.
dhp256-272:261: Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca,ahiṁsā saṁyamo damo;Sa ve vantamalo dhīro,"thero" iti pavuccati.
dhp256-272:262: Na vākkaraṇamattena,vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā;Sādhurūpo naro hoti,issukī maccharī saṭho.
dhp256-272:263: Yassa cetaṁ samucchinnaṁ,mūlaghaccaṁ samūhataṁ;Sa vantadoso medhāvī,"sādhurūpo"ti vuccati.
dhp256-272:264: Na muṇḍakena samaṇo,abbato alikaṁ bhaṇaṁ;Icchālobhasamāpanno,samaṇo kiṁ bhavissati.
dhp256-272:265: Yo ca sameti pāpāni,aṇuṁthūlāni sabbaso;Samitattā hi pāpānaṁ,"samaṇo"ti pavuccati.
dhp256-272:266: Na tena bhikkhu so hoti,yāvatā bhikkhate pare;Vissaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya,bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
dhp256-272:267: Yodha puññañca pāpañca,bāhetvā brahmacariyavā;Saṅkhāya loke carati,sa ve "bhikkhū"ti vuccati.
dhp256-272:268: Na monena munī hoti,mūḷharūpo aviddasu;Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha,varamādāya paṇḍito.
dhp256-272:269: Pāpāni parivajjeti,sa munī tena so muni;Yo munāti ubho loke,"muni" tena pavuccati.
dhp256-272:270: Na tena ariyo hoti,yena pāṇāni hiṁsati;Ahiṁsā sabbapāṇānaṁ,"ariyo"ti pavuccati.
dhp256-272:271: Na sīlabbatamattena,bāhusaccena vā pana;Atha vā samādhilābhena,vivittasayanena vā.
